component.name: Scum Bag
component.summary: Save Scummer - Automatically backup and restore game save files

description.p: Scum Bag is a save file backup and restoration tool for any game or application. It automatically backs up your save files at configurable intervals and lets you restore to any backup point, making save scumming effortless.

ul.li: Create save profiles with custom backup frequency and maximum backup limits
Restore to any backup point with a simple click
Only creates backups when save files actually change (no duplicate backups)
Reads Steam libraries to automatically find installed games
Takes screenshots of the game window when save files change
Works with any game or application that creates save files
